During the investigation, Lina is asked to repeat her story to several professionals.
As her lawyer, what should you advocate for Name at least two actions.
texts.content_text100: You should request that Lina be interviewed only when necessary, ideally through a single, well-conducted interview.
texts.content_text101: You should ask that interviews take place in a child-friendly setting, not a formal courtroom.
texts.content_text102: You should promote coordination between professionals to avoid repeated questioning.
texts.content_text103: You should request audio-visual recording so Lina does not need to relive the experience multiple times.
texts.content_text_feedback: You must actively prevent secondary victimisation and ensure procedures are adapted to the child’s needs
